definition: lit. moonlight group/fig. those who spend their monthly income even before they earn their next salary (slang)
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: This year could be, so she's "Clair de Lune group" to start the "customer accounts.
sentences.chinese: 可今年，她這樣的“月光族”開始做起了“賬客”。

sentences.english: Would you choose a moonlite girl to be your wife?
sentences.chinese: 你會選擇“月光族”女孩做老婆麼？

sentences.english: My brother is one of the typical moonlight clans.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟是個典型的月光族。

sentences.english: In the first fall in front of the crisis is "Moonlight family."
sentences.chinese: 在危機面前最先倒下的“月光族”。

sentences.english: Arbitrariness of the spending is' moonlight clan 'cause.
sentences.chinese: 隨意性的開支是‘月光族’產生的根源。

definition: a slave to one's credit card/sb who is unable to repay their credit card borrowings
(coll.) adults still living with and depending on their parents
debtor (jocular term, homonymous with 富翁[fu4 weng1])
extravagant (idiom); to throw away money by the handful/wasteful
(coll.) to live with and depend on one's parents even upon reaching adulthood
to assess one's income and spend accordingly (idiom); to live within one's means/You can only spend what you earn.
